title: Kung Wow Chicken
directions: Well, I'm back in lovely San Francisco after our whirlwind trip to New York City, and even though I have a serious case of jetlag, I wanted to post this highly simplified and quite Americanized version of Kung Pao chicken.
ingredients: Ingredients for 4 Servings Kung Wow (Kung Pao) Chicken
1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts. cut into 1-inch cubes
white parts from 3-4 green onions, chopped
1 tablespoon soy sauce, or to taste
1 tablespoon Asian chili paste (sambal), or more to taste
2 tablespoons peanut vegetable oil for frying
1 tablespoon cornstarch, dissolved in 2 tablespoon water
